name: MoonsideLight
0:
”Alexa, turn on Moonside Light.”
”Alexa, set Moonside Light brightness to 50 percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this Alexa skill, you can control your Moonside smart lights through your Alexa. You can set the brightness of your lights, turn them on and off, and many more. Simply say:
"Alexa, turn on Moonside Light."
"Alexa, set Moonside Light to 50 percent brightness."

To get started, please make sure that you have synced your lights with your Moonside account in the Moonside app. To be able to control your Moonside lights with Alexa, your lights need to be on the WiFi cloud mode. To see detailed instructions, please visit: www.moonside.design/alexa

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to our support team: contact@moonside.design
